Text: La fanciulla del West:  "Fanciulla" followed "Madama Butterfly", which was also based on a Belasco play.
Triplets:<La fanciulla del West
2:
--------------------
Text: La fanciulla del West:  The opera has fewer of the show-stopping highlights that are characteristic of other Puccini works, but is admired for its impressive orchestration and for a score that is more melodically integrated than is typical of his previous work.
